data.name: popclass
data.description: A  python package that allows flexible, probabilistic classification of a microlensing event

evidence: "popclass is a python package that allows flexible, probabilistic classification of the lens of a microlensing event given the event's posterior distribution and a model of the Galaxy."

"popclass provides the bridge between Galactic simulation and lens classification, an interface to common Bayesian inference libraries, and the ability for users to flexibly specify their own Galactic model and classification parameters."

Badges indicate distribution via package registries: "![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/popclass?label=pypi%20package)" and "[![conda-forge](https://anaconda.org/conda-forge/popclass/badges/version.svg)](https://anaconda.org/conda-forge/popclass)"
